DOC.brief_summary: This phase III , multicenter , randomize , single blind study design evaluate efficacy tolerability single dose parecoxib compare diclofenac treatment acute pain due renal colic .
DOC.detailed_description: This study prematurely discontinue May 3 , 2004 due slow recruitment . The decision terminate trial base safety concern .
DOC.criteria: diagnosis renal colic ; baseline pain > 50 mm VAS ; evidence neoplasm severe disease organ , include psychiatric illness ; active GI disease ( e.g . Crohn 's disease ulcerative colitis ) evidence concomitant disease may lead early termination study
